column1: '''''iach''''' is a word only appearing in compound names (cf. Examples). The word is commonly understood to be a [[Sindarin]] noun meaning meaning "ford" or "crossing".<ref>{{HM
column2: GS}}, pp. 319, 323</ref><ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 20 July 2011)</ref>
